content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and i was sat next to my terrace sliding doors, as my arm chairs are next to the terrace windows, then suddenly something caught my attention  from the corner of my eye. outside in the distance towards the mediterranean sea, i saw this bright orange illuminus long shaped line, very rectangular shaped, and thin looking, like if someone had painted an orange line on the dark sky.  i started to doubt what i was seeing so to make sure  what i was seeing was true, i opened my terrace doors and stepped outside thinking it was a reflection on the glass, it wasn't a reflection  and then i noticed how this orange rectangular light, started to fade away slowly into the dark. during those moments i had mixed emotions, i started to doubt myself and then reality set in, i felt my blood go to my feet as i got a bit scared, i don't know why. maybe because i couldn't find a rational explanation. i hope that someone just like myself, did see this phenomenon, all along the busy costa del sol here in the south of spain.  i'm sure, that i was not the only witness to this. i hope i get news to confirm this or to give me some explanation of what it was.
content.summary: a  line of orange light

content.detailedDescription:
On july 6th, 2007 i was at my sister's house in northern ohio.  i believe the city is birmingham, oh, just south of vermilion.  it was late and everyone had turned in with the exception of myself, my nine-year-old niece, and twelve-year-old nephew-in-law.  we were discussing some pretty deep subjects all night regarding ghosts, re-incarnation, etc.  for some reason, i had an intuition to step out into the night sky with one kid under each arm.  as we glanced upward, we thought we were seeing a falling star and as quick as we tried to mouth the words, it stopped mid sky, only to shoot off in the opposite direction.  the trajectory was uncanny.  when it approached, it appeared to be coming from our upper right side as we were facing south.  it looked as if it was coming around the earth, not dropping straight down.  it looked like a white light when it approached with incredible speed. when it stopped it looked like a silver oval object with no sound or light.  it stopped near the star deneb in the cygnus constellation.  this was no coincidence to me since i was just introduced to knowing this constellation a month prior through a web site that had a lot of synchronstic type experiences going on...Like connecting dots.  it stopped momentarily and then as fast as it approaced, it took off to our left in an upward trajectory.  the children said they both saw a green energy come out of it as it left the stationary position.  we were all speachless at the timing of it all.  why did we step out into the night sky at that time?  we were in awe and to make sure we didn't influence one another, we went inside and each drew a picture of what we saw.  all three matched.

there was more here than a simple coincidence.  i had a reading done a month prior to this that said i was from the stars.  cygnus was the place a friend of mine said we had originated from.  was this a sign?  since then, my neice said she had seen the craft in what i understand was a similar account, at dark, near their home in crawfordsville,indiana.  i did not get the details, but my sister knew that she was telling the truth, and i believe her.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: July 6th, 2007 early am sighting of silver oval object that moved at incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a high school football game looking at the big, low, orange moon when my dad said, look at those lights. he said two went together from west to east and the third came from a slightly different angle, intercepted, joined the other two, and they all three proceeded until they were out of view.  he said he had never seen anything move that fast except a missile.  he held up his finger and thumb in an open v-shape and said they were bird-shaped. we were facing east. the moon was low in the sky about 10 o'clock angle and the lights were went over our heads from about 5 o'clock to 1 o'clock. on the way home i asked if they were as bright as the headlights coming toward us. dad said know, they were neon, white.
content.summary: 3 bright, white-neon, bird-shaped lights sped through the sky after dusk in sacramento, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was in the yard with my camera and was able to capture this picture of a ufo while while focusing on an airplane. i include an enlargement of the ufo and the original photo.
content.summary: Ufo photographed among other objects

content.detailedDescription: I was in the yard with my camera and was able to capture this picture of a ufo while lots of anomalous activity was going on. i include an enlargement of the ufo and the original photo.
content.summary: Sky alive with  anomalous activity for at least 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking upstairs and looked out a large window where the stairs turned at the halfway point.  i saw a multi color lighted saucer shaped thing hovering silently just 10-15 feet away.  it was no more than 1.5 feet in diameter.  i thought someoneone had a neat remote controlled flying saucer.  i watched it when suddenly it flew away at a high rate of speed, faster than what seemed possible. i remember watching it fly several several blocks thinking that where i perceived it to be, at this distance, i shouldn't be able to see it anymore.  it also may have appeared grey at this distance.  then it was gone.  i sat there thinking did this just happen?  what was this?
the moment was gone, and i wished i could have it back, it was just too strange.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small discoid with multi-colored lights hovered near house

content.detailedDescription: Murfreesboro, tn. 10.26.07. 20:10. front porch of my apartment, near mtsu campus. while star gazing, observed a red point of light moving north - south across the sky, too fast and too distant to be an aircraft. observer first assumed object was an orbiting satellite. the object suddenly deviated from its trajectory, moving with great speed in a triangle formation, then briefly returning to the original trajectory before moving quickly from sight in no more than an instant.
content.summary: Bright lightn moves steadily, deviates from trajectory, disappears

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern,

   i was wondering why there has never been a documentary or investigation into the mid 1970���s up state new york massive and multiple ufo sightings? it has always seen strange to me, that over the years not one mention of that incident has been ever reported on. i was one of the many that saw something that night. i have never revealed the other witness that was with me that night or what she said and did. nor have i ever stated what her brother told me the next day but his encounter. plus when i was married to my x-wife pat, we saw a couple sightings that we both keep quite about. we have not talked about the sightings that we saw, in many, many years. but i am sure that her memories will be very similar to mine. if you would like to read my report, which i gave months later to an investigator, go to ( www.Uisiom.Com/ufo ), my report is there on my web site. if you have any question please feel free to contact me at,

uisiom@hotmail.Com, 

write to me at 
11 appalachian dr. grantville, 
p.A. 17028, 

call at 
1-717-469-9291.  

                                                          thank you
                                                   jan richard bowles
content.summary: Unbelievable sighting

content.detailedDescription: We were camping at pettit jean state park.  sitting around the camp fire i was looking up at the stars when i noticed what looked like two of them slowly moving. at first i thought it was a tree limb swaying in the breeze giving them the appearence that they were moving. i stood up to walk to a clearing for a better view. as i watched closely they became brighter and moved a little faster, staying perfectly parallel coming from a north east direction. i said to my wife, what the hell! those aren't jets, they don't have any running lights (i had seen jets fly over earlier and they all had the usual red flashing lights)these had no lights. they were about the brightness of the planet jupiter and about the same size at first. she couldn't see them from were she was sitting because of the trees.By the time she finally got up they were gone. as they got closer they seem to get brighter for a split second, then changed to a north west direction still staying perfectly parallel. at this time they started to fade, then they kind of flickered and disappeared. this all took place in about 20 seconds. i coundn't get it out of my mind all night. my wife thinks i'm crazy! she said they must be jets. i said jets wouldn't be flying that close together. i know they weren't jets because earlier i could watch the jets cover the sky and slowly disappear on the horizon. these objects came and left in a short area of space.
content.summary: Two spheres flying parallel, changed direction then quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
a friend and i were fishing/camping up pond holler in premier, wv.  at about 2:30 am we were just getting ready to go to sleep.  we were lying on our sleeping bags talking.  we were both looking up at the stars when a really bright light came into view.  i guess it was traveling about 600 mph.  we thought it was a satellite at first.  it traveled for some ways and then it dimmed and took off like a bat out of hell, it disappeared within two seconds.  shortly after it took off we saw a streak of fire chasing after it.  the object left it like it was sitting still.  we then saw the fighter jet.  the missle was traveling about 2,500 mph, and the object left it like it was sitting still.  the missle traveled for a short distance before the flame from it's engine went out.  there was a flash when it exploded and we heard the boom about 30-40 seconds later.  the jet had already turned around when the object disappeared.  
    my fishing buddy was freaking out because it scared the hell out of him.  i knew exactly what was going on and he didn't even want to believe what had just happened. he was in his early 20's and i was in my late 30's.  myself, i was awestruck and excited, my heart felt like it was going to come out of my chest. i finally had proof that they were out there.  he wanted to leave and go home and i talked him out of it.  we didn't get to sleep until about 5:00 am.
    if you need to contact me, call after 9:00pm on weekdays and anytime on weekends.  please leave brief message what call concerns.
content.summary: Was a bright light @ 30,000' or higher.

content.detailedDescription: I consider myself an intelligent person and i have a successful business in the milwaukee, wi area. i have visited northern wisconsin many times in my life and enjoy watching the night sky. at about 10:00 pm this particular clear summer night, one of my sons, my brother in law and i were sitting on my brother in law's deck outside of egg harbor, wi over looking the water to the east on green bay which is part of lake michigan. the water was very calm that night which made for a nice quiet night. we were looking at many things that we had seen in the sky before, stars, the space station, satellites, planes, etc. looking over the water i noticed a light at about a 2 o'clock position in the sky. i said to my brother in law that this plane was flying in an unusual path, slow and straight towards land to our right. this was something that we had never seen previously. expecting to hear the sound of an airplane engine i noticed that there was none. my brother in law said that was strange and as we both watched, the light blinked and went off at an unbelievable speed to the north and disappeared. we have seen jets fly over before and this was alot faster than any jet we had ever seen. my brother in law started to laugh and looked at me. i said i think we just saw something and before i could finish my 14 year old son said he was scared and wanted to go in the house. i told him there was nothing to worry about and looked back at my brother in law who had a funny look on his face. i said to him i think we just saw a ufo. he said with a kind of laughing tone that he agreed that what we saw was a ufo. we had not been drinking and we were not tired from the day. in fact we stayed out for another 2 hours waiting to see it again but it never came back. i know i felt fine, just amazed at how fast the light moved. not much was said the next day, however after we told our wives and the other kids, everybody was sitting out watching the next night. nothing like this was seen that night. not much has been said about this since but lately i have had the feeling that i need to get this out and let someone know about this. i hope this helps myself as well as anyone else who may have seen something like this.
content.summary: We saw a strange light in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house when my daughter called out to me saying.. dad come out here hurry! mom wants to show you something.So i went and to my amazement, to the south was 4 balls of light that appeared to only be ten miles away, moving west very slow,then out appeared a 5th one .They seemed to have disapeared into yhin air once they got to a certain point one at a time. and what sucks about this sighting was that we were so amazed we did get a pic or on video , we both even had our cellphones on us!
content.summary: Lookd like 5 stars cruisn above tree line

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were traveling along route 1 in princeton, nj when we noticed what looked like a disk shaped object out of the side window over the town of princeton.  we went about about 15 miles with this disk shaped object following us on the left side of the road.  finally we were at our turn and the object continued straight and we could see it for some time out our back window.  finally it disappeared.
content.summary: Disk shaped object followed car

content.detailedDescription: I was riding home at approx. 3am near colts neck, nj when a light appeared in my front window.  it followed me turn for turn for over 1 hour never leaving my view in the front window.  made several 90 degree turns and the sphere never left the view of my front window. finally got near east brunswick, nj and the light (sphere) disappeared as fast as it came.
content.summary: Light followed car for over an hour

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 freinds (rudy and mecheal) went camping in an area called "the gravel pit" in the rural town of tickfaw la. we had brought a hand held cb, flashlight, and portable radio. we were laying side by side (me on the left, mechael in the middle, and rudy on the right). the first thing we noticed were the bats. they begain flying around us in a circle, then at us. one even made contact with my face. next, the radio, which i had right above my head (and i suspecy may had something to do with the bat attacking me) started picking up static and acted as if it lost power(we had just put new batteries in it). rudy picked it up and played with it and it sprang right back into action. then, about 15-20 min later, all three of us started getting bit by something. i got up, turned the flashlight on and saw something i had never seen before. hundreds, if not thousands of ants had converged in a perfect circle around us! we couldnt find where they had come from. we moved our gear a few yards away and the ants stayed marching in this circle for some time. onced moved, we took the same position as before. the sky was crystal clear  and we were all silent with just the radio on. as i was looking into the sky i saw a star like object. i first thought it was a plane. i then realized it was acting to bizzare to be a plane. it was more like "jumping" than flying. it sarted jumping in a triangle pattern.It did this for a few moments. i stayed queit becuase i was still thinking it was just my eyes and the motion of th eearth playing tricks on my mind. then, rudy asked if i was seeing the samething in the sky that he was. then mecheal said she had been watching it to. we looked at it moving from triangle, to square, to circle lik epaterns for about 15 mins. then, two more smaller star-like objects joined it. at first, they seemed to be almost "playing" with each other. all three joining together in various geometeric-like shapes. they did this for a few mins, then the two smaller ones broke off and engauged in what i can only describe as a "dog fight" they chased each other and exchanged "energy" almost like shooting at each other. the larger light did not join in this. in fact, it had become sationary once the two small ones broke off from formation with it. this "dog fight last 2 mns at most. then, they shot away from each other at speeds i have never seen an aircraft travel at. they were gone in less than a blink of an eye. the larger object remained still for a long time. long enough for us to lose the intial awe of it all and start to talk about it. we went back and forth about what it could have been, but we were all in agreement that it was no kind of aircraft we had ever seen. i jokingly picked up the hand held cb and started "talking" to the light. giving it silly greetings, insulting it, telling it to come on down and sit next to the fire with us. then, it came to life! it shot right over our heads....Close! right above the tree line and passed us, out of our sight. i was startled so bad that i had drop the cb and prepared to run. in the process, i broke the antenna off of it. we all 3 jumped up by the fire and started to debate wether we should leave i didnt want to tell rudy i broke his cb antanna so i thew it into the woods close to us. then the object returned, slowly hovering just above the tree line, maybe 100-150 yards away. it was so close that we could see a distinct "core" which was brillant bright white, and sheathed in a radiant aura of white light (glowing i guess you could call it. we set motionless and silent and just watched it. what i call a "spotlight" beam, only slightly cone shaped came on underneath the object and it started slowly moving just above the inside of the tree line. it was completely silent.I got the impression it was looking for something, but if they were so advance they would have found us without effort. it moved on until we couldn't see it any more. it was then that without much debate we decided it was time to leave. we started packing and rudy saw that the antanna was missing. i voiced up and told him the truth about what happened to it and where i threw it. he was of course a bit upset and asked that i go find it. giving the current situation i was very reluctant; however. i know it landed only about 15-20 feet away from us right on the tree line. the area was so close it was recieving light from the fire so i decided id go get it. i got the flashlight and went to the tree line. i hoped that the shiny metal would reflect the fire's light and be easy to spot. i didnt see it. i shined the flashlight into the trees and almost instantly saw a portion of the antanna amoung thick bushes just inside the trees. i almost decided to leave it and say i couldny find it. i did not want to go into the woods after what we just experienced. but, rudy was a good freind and i felt bad so i went in after in. i had to get on on my hands and knees to crawl under the bushes. i kept shining the light but lost the location of the antanna while crawling. i stoped for a moment to shine the light around and try and find it. rudy and mecheal were yelling at me to hurry so we could go. while looking around, i saw the antanna in the light, it was infront of me at arms length on the other side of the bushes. when i reached for it i heard a slight crackling in the leaves on the otherside of the bushes. it was very close. i froze. the next thing i noticed was a smell i can only describe as mild musky odor mixed with anesthetic chemicels like in hospitals. i shined the light in the direction of the crackle sounds. at first i thought what i saw was the root base of two small trees growing close to each other. i quickly decided it wasn't trees, or roots. it was feet! in the light i could see thin fleashy legs, pronounced knees. what i tought was roots where three thick toes. i didnt noticed toe nails, but did see defined "knuckle" joins midway in the toes. one of the toes moved slightly. i quickly shined the light up. i'm sorry that i cant recall the exact details, but it was short. i would say maybe 4" it was humaniod with long thin arms. i didn't notice the hands in any detail. the head was large and the eyes reflected the light almost like a cat or dogs eyes in the dark. i had the light on it for maybe a second before i jumped up (getting cut ans scraped by the bushes and ran back to the fire screaming.I was so in shock that i didnt even noticed that i had ran and stopped in the remains of the fire. they kept asking me what was wrong. all i could do was beg them leave with me.  the heat and burning of the fire sort of snapped me back a little. they  got me out of it. i told them i would tell them once we left. they started grabbing up the gear. i grab the machette we used on fire wood ready to strike at that thing if i saw it again. once we got out of the woods and on the road walking back to rudy's house, i explained what i saw. they picked up the pace. we made it back to the house and lay down in our beds. we briefly went over the episode of the night then went to sleep. i for one had wild and vivid dreams about the gravel pit. in the dream, the song we where listening to when the event started played back to back very vividly. at one point, i dreamed that i woke up because something was coming into the window. i then realised that i was still dreaming and laid back down. when i did the strange gravel pit dream continued. when i woke up for real. i told them bits of my dream. before i could mention the song, mecheal said that she kept dreaming abou the song. rudy claimed he did two. that morning (more like noon) we told his mom and a neighbor. i believe it was his mother that said people had been reporting seeing something that looked like a "faun" (like puck...Half man half deer). well what i saw didn't look like that, but regurdless, there was something there. these days. i sometimes wonder if i acually saw it. i recall the lights in the sky like it was yesterday, but the "creature" event is kind of fuzy to me. i attribute it to the shock and state of mind that i was when when i saw "it" that obsures my memory of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights making geometric symbols in sky, electronics malfunctioning, wildlife acting strange, and a humanoid in the woods.

content.detailedDescription: Flat bed rail car w/ tarp covering all except one where the tarp came loose. the vessels i could see where saucer shaped w/ 2 seats which today would be called high back and had what appeared to be a glass  doom.Three  tri-pods/ ports coming out of the sides  and bottom of the craft. i am  59 years old and a retireed military veteran. i have never said anything to anyone  about this  occourance since it happened in the 1950's. my friend larry clark i think still lives in anniston , alabama an he was present when this  happened. i have not spoke to him in almost 45 years.  i will  take a polygraph  on what i am listing here.    thak you, dj jernigan
content.summary: Rail cars leaving ft. mc clellan ala.Chem warfare center

content.detailedDescription: There are sphere shapped objects arround my neighborhood. they are almost gray with green dots. no light emmiting. first, only one showed up. but we are taking pictures of them every day and numbers keep raising. most of the times they can be spotted near satelite antenas or any other signal emmiting devices like radios and cell phones. they do not produce any sounds. various pictures from diferent cameras show the same shapes. one of my meighbors wascleaning his car at night and taking pictuers of it to sell it on the internet when he took a picture of his back yard he noticed the "ball shapped" object over a stable. he showed me the picture and at first i thought it was the moon, but quickly i realized that there was no full moon that day plus there are trees behind that stable. since theese sightings have been ocurring, every time i turn on my computer or cell phone static or interference are present. lights blink.
content.summary: Sphere shaped u.F.O. sightings
Bright red burning ball with smokey white tail falling slowly in the west.  lasted about 4-5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I live in a wooded residential neighborhood on the northeast side of indianapolis, in.  at 12:10am i turned off my light to go to sleep and glanced outside my bedroom window as i always do.  i noticed what i thought was a bright star in the sky which i thought was strange because it was really cloudy out.  i looked at it closer and realized it was much closer that a star would be.  it seemed to be just below the tree line in my back yard.  i was horrified but couldn't take my eyes off of it.  it had one big light that pulsed in brightness and was for the most part constant and two smaller lights, one on each side of the main light that also pulsed but at some times became completely dark. at times all three lights became really bright and illuminated the trees around the area. you could see a triangular shape in the glow.  at times lights shot down the sides. also even smaller lights seemed to explode to the sides of the side lights that were different colors, blue, orange, yellow.  twice lights flashed along the base quickly then disappeared.  it seemed to hover, moving slightly up and down.  i was extremely scared because i was alone.  i thought about calling someone but i was afraid that it would draw the attention of the "thing".  at times it went completely dark.  i watched it until about 4:30am.  during that time it slowly moved lower and then to the right until i was unable to see it through the window.  while watching it i didn't notice that it was moving vertically or up and down at all until it was out of my sight which is strange.  i think i was looking too hard at just the lights.  i went downstairs and grabbed a large knife and a camera.  i was too scared to take a picture of it.  i watched it by peeking from behind a wall in my kitchen until it moved slowly away back behind trees in my neighbors yard which is set back from our street.  it glowed to each side of a tree trunk.  at that point i went back upstairs and sat in my room with the knife listening to every little sound in my house, absolutely terrified.  i slept from exhaustion around 4:45pm until 6:00am when i had to get up to go to work.  it was gone when i woke.  at this point i am unable to sleep at my house and am staying with my sister.
content.summary: A bright light that varied in brightness with smaller lights to the sides that also blinked and then all became bright at the same time.  other smaller colored lights exploded to the sides of these lights. other lights on the sides madea triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hwy.221 forest city north carolina, i turned onto chase high rd. and it appeared it was motionless at first but soon followed in persuite of me and my kids, i had never experianced anything like this. but my son yelled they are going to eat us! i have never seen him so paniced. so i gased it to my house it followed and hovered outside for about 10 minutes. it then vanished like a shooting star.
content.summary: Lights top and bottom shiney in color

content.detailedDescription: At about 3:55 am i was having a look out my windows around my house as i usually do when i awaken in the middle of the night and as i was looking west over my driveway i saw a flashing light in the sky below the full moon heading east, as the light moved east i went to my front window and continued to watch the light continue east under the cloud cover. at first i thought it might be a plane or helicopter, but there was no noise like a helicopter and it appeared to be moving to slow for a plane. these lights were not like the strobes on the bottom of an airplane or helicopter which usually display a red or blue light between the actual flashing of the strobe, and small lights at the tips of the wings and it is unusual for planes and helicopters to be flying at this time of night in the hinton area. i could not see any form to the object other than the lights looked like an egg shape. the flashing was constant but was still lighted up between the actual bright flashes. the colour of the light was white. the object moved under what clouds there was over hinton towards the east of hinton.
content.summary: Saw flashing light travelling east from mountains

content.detailedDescription: I had just got finished watching a movie at a friend���s house. as i was driving home on 281 in the direction to burnet from marble falls. i noticed a fairly bright light in the sky to my 10:30. i first thought was it was a star although once i looked again i knew it was much too bright to be a star. secondly there had been a storm gathering for the last couple of hours and you couldn���t make out any of the sky from all the clouds. as i drove further it got my direct attention when i noticed it appeared to be moving due east... i stares for a numbed of sec hard to see if i noticed any blinking or flashing to represent a plane. that���s when i realized how low and close to it i was. by that time it was making its way across the highway in a wave like motion. my heart started pumping and i realized what it was. well at least what it was not. i sped up to get as close to the object as i could.  about that time it was as if it was floating down like a feather. my visual was interrupted by the tree line. i then circled the area multiple times. but had no luck seeing it again.
content.summary: Driving home and i spotted a bright light to my 10:30. as i drove it slowly crossed the road in a wave motion.  then dropped out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in oak brook,il attending a book signing event for nikki sixx. i was there with my girlfriend susan. we were waiting outside the borders bookstore, specifically the rear which faced west onto route 83(15th st & frontage rd.). i was facing  north-northeast watching the planes take off out of o'hare airport. 

i looked north and saw a round object moving westerly and a leisurely pace. i had my ef 100-300 f4-5.6 lens mounted to my canon 20d. i set my lens to just over 200mm and set the focus to manual. i know my lens is soft on the focus as it get over 275mm. so i set the focus to be on the center at infinity. i had taken some shots of a nearby building just to check the focus. 

originally i thought it was a black plastic bag. it seemed to turn and tumble as it moved. i wish i had my celestron regal ls 10x42 binoculars. i know the object was north of route 56 and probably route 38. it was had to tell the distance, as i was trying to keep the object in the viewfinder. it appeared to condense and the expand. it seemed to get bright but i believe it was from reflections. 

i really did not feel excited nor afraid. i just really wanted to capture the image of the object. i have seen some strange lights and objects before but not during the day.


i lost sight of the object after about 20 minutes. before it disappeared it seem to get elongated and seemed to have a lighter appearance. i kept checking the sky for other objects but found nothing.
content.summary: Waiting around and taking pictures

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday, october 20, 2007 i videotaped two metallic orbs in levittown, new york, at approx. 5:00 pm. the first orb basicly seemed to come out of the clouds, then level off and floated out of sight. at first i thought it was a balloon. then when it either returned or an other orb showed up. this one was seen just floating over the area and not really moving like the first. it seemed like it knew i was there. i waved at it, but no responce. it slowly floated away after hanging around. 

my next sighting was on monday, october 22, 2007 at 3:15 pm. i was working when i noticed something spinning through my window. i grabed my camera and filed what looked like a spinning metallic cube. it also came down from the sky. when it (seem to) notice me tapeing it, it slowed down and hovered turning like a top. i have noticed a lot of contrail activity these last two weeks, and feel they're some how connected, as all my sights have been on somewhat cloudy days. 

i have posted my videos on you tube and google video. the search words are "ufos in levittown, ny". i will also attach some files for your viewing with this message.

thank you.
content.summary: Two day ufo sight, strange clouds and contrails.

content.detailedDescription: Try to talk to them with your mind but do not believe anything they tell you. they will not be kind
content.summary: Rhode island i know, i've seen the birds and sometimes balloons

content.detailedDescription: Newport's been a hot spot for awhile now i've got rods, rectangles, semi cloaked ufo in infrared and day time all video shot from my deck same camera zoom lens and fitted for day time infrared. i've had so many encounters i'm losing track and the best unfortunately i've not caught on film. one thing i do know when the birds are thick ufos show up what better creature to use for remote viewing. make sure you follow the whole story!
content.shape: Cigar,  Oval,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Unknown
content.summary: Ufos and crazy birds.Newport's been a hot spot for awhile now i've got rods, rectangles, semi cloaked in infrared

content.detailedDescription: Our dog was barking at the door so my wife went to the door and said there was something in the sky it was  huvering just above the tree line. it was about the size of a boeing airplane in the middle of it was a glowing florissant light which was the middle of it.It would stop and huver and then move off very slow, it had a deep red light  that wuold come on ever five minutes on top of it,thin i saw about four airplanes that was following it and then they brook off like they got scared are something it finly moved off over the tree line.
content.summary: moving very slow and hovering

content.detailedDescription: 3:00 am large dark retangular or boomerang shaped silent craft flew briskly in a south southeastern direction over kansas city, ks.  it had about 7 dimmly lit orange/red lights on the bottom, approximately 10,000 to 30,000 feet in altitude and moving 300-1000 knots south southeast. size is estimated at from the ground twice as big as the pleides(?) constellation or three times the size of a stealth b2 bomber.  as it coasted briskly southward it seemed to either speed up suddenly, or perhaps my eyes were not able to follow it because of the moonlight and city light pollution, but it was undeniably there when first sighted, a magnificent thing to behold especially since all my other sightings were of the star-like variety, fast movers and stoppers quickly changing direction, it was my first actual adult aged sighting which i could tell what it really looked like. thanks to creator source for the revelation of what the technological secretkeepers are doing.
content.summary: Dark silent rectangular with several dim orange/red lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription: Here i go again...This is the third time in 4 months i've seen this type of thing here.  just looked up into the night sky as i walked out of my apartment and noticed a very bright sphere going from the northwest to the southeast.  at first i thought that it was zig zagging slightly but i could have been mistaken because of the disorientation i usually feel when i see these things. it stood out because the glow seemed to be brighter than the moon that was right beside it. i checked for blinking lights in case it may have been a plane but there were none, just a steady bright glow, and it flew a straight line until it started to disintegrate.  it slowly started to dissolve..Sort of reappeared then completely dissolved.  there were no clouds for it to go behind.
content.summary: Bright sphere crossing and disappears

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking photos of the orionide meteor shower between 4 and 6am...Pics 86 to 91 show an object to the right of venus start out faint, get bright, and then fade out...They are 15 sec exposures, 1 has a meteorite in it...I'd like to find out what it is i photographed..At the time of shooting pics i did not notice object,not until viewing pics later on..

location was salisbury beach reservation,massachusetts


   i have 7pics that illustrate the motion,but could only send three,i could email the rest if anyone is interested in answering my question...What is it?  thank you for your time...
content.summary: Object flys in and out of sight
